effect.shortEffect: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%.
effect.full: Transforms 10% or 50% Zygarde into Complete Forme when its HP is below 50%. This ability cannot be copied or replaced. This ability only takes effect for Zygarde.

description.sun-moon: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.
description.sword-shield: Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes half or less. Then the Pokémon changes its form to Complete Forme.
